answers.answer: Hi please don't worry more over it , you may have a bit of anxiety because of what happened , please try and put it at the back of your mind , Please try and stop the Masturbating in the week , if it continues have a chat with your Family Doctor , but i think you will be just fine next time , take care ,

You would be smart to stop smoking since it will ruin your vascular system.  Get checked for diabetes.L-arginine and pumpkin seed supplements will probably help you in the short term, but the cigarettes or diabetes or thyroid disease are all possible causes.
Please don't take this out on your girlfriend.  It is not her fault and this is extremely unkind and confusing to women.  You should apologize and never do that again.

question: I am a 19  year old man and have been having sex with my girlfriend for about a year now. Just the other day for the first time I could not get hard. I was pretty pissed off about this and got mad at myself and my girlfriend. We tried again two days later and the same result occurred. I was once again really upset with myself it made my self-esteem go down. I think it was because I kept thinking about the other day not being able to preform and get an erection. I am an active kid in college who does like to drink and smoke. I masturbate around 3 times a week. Should I take a cleanse and stop preforming all of these activities? Should I look into investing medical help? Or was it just a one time thing? Will this continue and be a problem for a while? Or is it just a mental thing that I shouldn't think or worry about?
title: Erection problems for a young man
